data.message:
I doubt he added many more fans from what he did tonight... (you have to like rap to begin with. And you were already a fan before or werent)...but I guarantee he lost way way more fans from this little political stunt. You can see all the die hard Trump supporters vowing to never listen to your shit again. I feel like he did this because he wanted to feel relevant again. And you know he's gonna be interviewed for weeks now about it. 

I personally thought it sucked. But he's still the #1 rapper in my opinion!
